metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19887 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the huffcode function (libfaac/huff2.c) in Freeware Advanced Audio Coder (FAAC) 1.29.9.2. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial of service in the book 4 case.

criterions.comment: faac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
